extendedInfo.description: Search â¢ Post â¢ Photo Previews â¢ Notifications â¢ Photo Wall â¢ Map Browser â¢ Multi-City Searches âââââ THE NEW YORK TIMES: "Craigslist Pro lets you search Craigslist much more easily than the Web site, and it offers a handful of other great features" cPro craigslist Client for Android is the ULTIMATE Craigslist mobile browser with myriad UNMATCHED features and options. SEARCH AGENTS notify you as soon as a new posting matching your search requirements appears on Craigslist.You can search in MULTIPLE CITIES and preview results with THUMBNAIL photos and item descriptions. GPS-based AUTO-LOCATION will automatically find and suggest Craigslist areas closest to you. You can POST with PHOTOS to Craigslist and MANAGE your Craigslist account (including EDITING, REPOSTING, etc). Browse listings by photos using the PHOTO WALL. See all listings on a map using the MAP BROWSER. You can SAVE and reuse FULLY-CONFIGURED SEARCHES. The TRACKING SYSTEM of SAVED SEARCHES displays new match indicators. cPro includes all ADULT sections of Craigslist. With millions of postings at Craigslist, finding an item of interest requires customized searches. cPro provides 20+ ENHANCED SEARCH OPTIONS to help you with that. SORT the results by DATE, MATCH, or PRICE. Use NEIGHBORHOOD filtering in metropolitan areas. Just tap on any photo and you will be able to see it FULL-SCREEN. SAVE posted PHOTOS to your Photo Albums. You can save any Craigslist posting to the list of your FAVORITES.If you found an interesting posting, you can EMAIL / TEXT it to either yourself or your friend directly from cPro. Of course, you can REPLY by email to posters too. (cPro is aware of the RECAPTCHA AUTHORIZATION when replying to Personals, and will assist you with that.) You can also use GOOGLE MAPS to retrieve DIRECTIONS to listings from your current location. Finally, for the time when you need a bit of entertainment, cPro features the "BEST OF CRAIGSLIST" category where all outrageously hilarious postings reside.âââââ CNET: "If you want a better way to search or post to Craigslist ... CraigsPro has plenty to offer" âââââ FORBES: "All of the features of Craigslist, but with a search agent option that notifies you of new results that match your terms." âââââ HOUSE BEAUTIFUL: "The entire world of Craigslist in the palm of your hand, with all gazillion listings: antiques, real estate, jobs. Not just for shoppersâyou can place ads, too.â âââââ CHICAGO NOW: "It features a GPS-based auto-location of nearby Craigslist areas and a fast, streamlined selection of search areas" âââââ TAPSCAPE: "The whole browsing experience is so much improved you may never go back to the actual website" âââââ CNBC: "OK, youâre managing your money, you're saving money, now guess what else you need to do? Make MORE money. With Craigslist Pro, now you can have that gigantic yard sale at your fingertips anytime, anywhere â and you can search multiple cities at a time." The craigslist and associated trademarks are owned by craigslist, Inc. and are being used under licensed permission from craigslist, Inc. for a limited purpose. www.craigslist.org

reviews.title: I think it may need an update?
reviews.comment: I love it.. n use it daily:) I think it may need an update cuz lately when I click on posts... The screen turns black n takes a couple seconds to load:( also sometimes when I come on it says there\'s no posts when I know there are cuz I was just looking at them?? Kinda weird... But I think the app may be due for an update other then that... I love it:)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: User friendly
reviews.comment: User friendly yet powerful mobile app preferred over website. Good job with this application.
reviews.author: Joe Lopez

reviews.title: Best of the CL apps.
reviews.comment: Fast, uncluttered and straightforward. Hands down the best CL app for Android.
reviews.author: Randy Jacobson

reviews.title: Good so far
reviews.comment: Easy access and user friendly.  Great tool
reviews.author: Reggie Hurt

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Love this app, simple and easy. User friendly as well.
reviews.author: David Donahue

reviews.title: Pretty useful
reviews.comment: Easy, quick, convenient. No problems yet.
reviews.author: Sayuri Valentina

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Nice visual appeal good functionality.
reviews.author: Chris Kimberlin

reviews.title: Great app, easy to use
reviews.comment: User friendly, anyone can use, no problems at all
reviews.author: yvonne waldie

reviews.title: It works, devs, keep it free.
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried every CL app there is and by far this is the best. User friendly and a clean look. I use CL a lot to buy/sell and the posting on this app works great.
reviews.author: Jack Mcmichael

reviews.title: Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: App won\'t allow me to do a general search, it only displays results when I add a search query. In every other way this app is amazing and I\'d gladly buy the paid version if this gets fixed. I emailed the app developer prior to rating but never received a reply.
reviews.author: Thomas Bunch

reviews.title: Second to none!!!
reviews.comment: Plain and simple by far outshines all of the other craigslist apps. Simple and easy to use, very cool feature is you\'re able to select multiple counties that you can do your search in. Very nice app, highly recommend to anyone who uses craigslist! Thank you!
reviews.author: Alex Kondratyuk

reviews.title: Craigslist, finally a decent format.
reviews.comment: Enjoying the look and feel. Used other apps. So far this the best on samsung galaxy TAb2 7\". Only grating annoiance is your constant reminders to buy pro version after 1 use. Pretty low.
reviews.author: CATHERINE CODY

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: This app has been very helpful. Whether I am posting ads, or just browsing. Overall great app. Download
reviews.author: Marlon Torres

reviews.title: Won\'t Post
reviews.comment: Crashed both times when I tried to post a listing. That\'s the only reason why I downloaded this. Guess I\'ll just have to buy the Mokriya Craigslist pro to get an app that actually works (and looks much better).
reviews.author: Jay Soriano

reviews.title: Problem posting
reviews.comment: Every time i go to post something from my phone, if my phone tilts the screen it kicks me to the start point.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Craigslist App
reviews.comment: This is far better app than the one from YYH Creative that I was using. Best Craigslist app I have found so far.
reviews.author: Mike Manley

reviews.title: About to unistall
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work unless connected to Wi-Fi. When posting ad\'s it crashes when they are done and ready to post. This app seriously sucks
reviews.author: Carla Chamut

reviews.comment: This is a poor excuse for craigslist because u can\'t add a posting without problems. It has to send the posting to ur email then u wait then you have to except then u wait then it fails to post or gets flagged rite away
reviews.author: Anthony Machabee

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: It is way better than the other craigslist app. You can post and seen like you have a degree I\'m advertising
reviews.author: Dylan Palidar

reviews.title: Can only save one alert!?!
reviews.comment: At first this app seemed perfect for setting up a search with a notification. However it will only save one alert before it directs you to the paid app.
reviews.author: Leigh Butler
